definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
Get well soon!/to recover health quickly

sentences.english: To summarize the effects of rehabilitation nursing for 112 stroke patients with dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 總結了112例腦卒中患者吞嚥障礙的康復護理體會。

sentences.english: She nursed her husband back to health.
sentences.chinese: 她精心照料丈夫，直到他康復。

sentences.english: Results The rehabilitation treatment after TKR is very satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 結果術後嚴格的康復治療取得了滿意的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: I take much solace in the fact that she has been recovering from her stroke.
sentences.chinese: 她中風後一直在康復中，這讓我大感安慰。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the needs of the families of hearing-impaired children.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解聽障兒童家長對康復認知與需求情況。

sentences.english: He's getting along hand over hand; he'll soon be convalescent.
sentences.chinese: 他的情況逐步有了起色，不久就會康復的。

sentences.english: This paper summarizes the nursing experience for 11 cases with locked-in syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 總結11例閉鎖綜合徵患者的早期康復護理經驗。
他說，全部患者都在康復之中。

sentences.english: But Tobey again stroke, good times don't last long, no chance of recovery.
sentences.chinese: 但好景不長，託比再度中風，再無康復的可能了。

sentences.english: When ill they are anxious for a hasty recovery.
sentences.chinese: 當他們患病時都渴望可瞬間康復。

sentences.english: Mary has great powers of resistance and will get well quickly.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗抗病力很強，很快就會康復的。

sentences.english: To assess the efficacy and safety of exercise-based rehabilitation for people with PH.
sentences.chinese: 評估以運動爲基礎的康復的功效和安全性。

sentences.english: With laparoscopy the recovery time is about one to two days.
sentences.chinese: 腹腔內鏡檢查證實康復時間爲1到2天。

sentences.english: He was bedridden for three weeks, but ultimately healed.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，傑克遜三週臥牀不起，但最終得以康復。

sentences.english: Conclusions Healthy teaching have promotion in a certain degreet psychosis p…
sentences.chinese: 結論健康教育對精神患者的康復有一定的促進作用。

sentences.english: Since then, they've been in an army-run rehabilitation centre.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，他們就一直在軍方的康復中心。

definition: to improve/to take a turn for the better/improvement
to recover completely (from illness or injury)
to reinstate/to resume/to restore/to recover/to regain/to rehabilitate
